book.synopsis: Introduction to poetry, fiction/nonfiction, and drama writing. Features complete works as examples and provides practical advice to encourage students to work on finding their own voice.
book.title_long: Three Genres: The Writing of Fiction/Literary Nonfiction, Poetry, and Drama
